slide.title: Document/Literal Example
slide.example:
<?php
require_once('SOAP/Client.php');

$baseurl = "http://www.epionet.com/webservices/epiowebservices";
$endpoint = 'http://www.epionet.com/epiowavewebservices/livecitycams/livecitycams.asp';
$client = new SOAP_Client($endpoint);

$result = $client->call("ListLiveCityCams", 
        NULL, 
        array('namespace' => $baseurl.'/livecitycams.wsdl',
            'soapaction' => $baseurl.'/livecitycams/listlivecitycams',
            'style' => 'document',
            'use' => 'literal')); 

if (PEAR::isError($result)) {
    echo $result->getMessage();
    exit;
}

print $client->wire;

foreach($result as $citycam) {
    $cam = $client->call("GetLiveCityCam", 
        array("citycamid" => $citycam->camid), 
        array('namespace'=> $baseurl.'/livecitycams.wsdl',
            'soapaction'=> $baseurl.'/livecitycams/getlivecitycam',
            'style' => 'document',
            'use' => 'literal')); 
    echo "$cam\n";
}

?>
